sections.title: Timeline
sections.text: Here you can see all the recently added publications in their chronological order.

sections.title: Authors
sections.text: In this section you can find the information about the authors, see their latest publications and also download a list of all the author's publications in the .docx format.

sections.title: Publications
sections.text: Here are the publications themselves. They can be split into the following types: articles, abstracts, dissertations, monographs, patents, reports, programs, textbooks.
